mapper.insert: insert into sf_shop_statistics (id, create_time, user_id, income_fee, profit_fee, order_count, product_count, pageviews_count, share_count, return_order_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{incomeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{profitFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageviewsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{returnOrderCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sf_shop_statistics set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, income_fee = #{incomeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, profit_fee = #{profitFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_count = #{orderCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_count = #{productCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pageviews_count = #{pageviewsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_count = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, return_order_count = #{returnOrderCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, user_id, income_fee, profit_fee, order_count, product_count, pageviews_count, share_count, return_order_count from sf_shop_statistics where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
